dmca.title: URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement and Website Misuse
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Rosenfield, Kevin (SEA) [mailto:KRosenfield@prestongates.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 13, 2005 5:54 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement and Website Misuse




I am an attorney for Valve Corporation.  Thank you for your prompt attention
to this matter.  

<<KA1RL20GR==ThePlanet CD-Keys.doc>> 

Kevin A. Rosenfield 
PrestonlGateslEllis LLP 

925 Fourth Ave, Suite 2900 
Seattle, Washington  98104-1158 

Phone   (206) 370-6586 (direct) 
Fax     (206) 370-6309 (direct) 

email   krosenfield@prestongates.com 

---------------

Kevin A. Rosenfield
krosenfield@prestongates.com
206-370-6586



June 11, 2007



URGENT/IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207
+1-214-782-7800

Re:  NOTICE OF INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY INFRINGEMENT AND                 
        WEBSITE MISUSE

Dear The Planet Internet Services:

	This letter serves as notification of Valve Corporation
